title: A Warrior Reborn
description: A Warrior Reborn tells the tale of Tristan, a warrior prince, who is captured and transformed into a feminine sex slave. Follow him as he tries to deal with his new sexual role. Love, sex, and revenge follow him through his story.This is an erotic story, and is not intended for audiences under the age of eighteen. It contains the sex, erotic situations, violence, and adult themes (among other things). If these, or the prospect of homosexuality, offend you, please do not read this story.51828 words(approx)
author: Nikki  Jenkins
